title: Bitcoin Under $39K As ETF Debut Continues To Be a ‘Sell-the-News’ Event
description: BTC was down nearly 5% in the past 24 hours, reaching its lowest level in two months. The CoinDesk 20, a liquid index of the highest tokens by market capitalization, fell 7%.

title: Invesco and WisdomTree cut fees on European ETPs as price war reaches Europe
description:
US investors in the country often turned to European and Canadian-based ETPs for investment, but now the tables have turned as US-based spot BTC ETFs are more easily accessible and more liquid, attracting European investors as well.

The spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) fee war has now reached Europe just weeks after asset managers got the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approval to list their respective ETFs on stock market.

Before the approval on Jan. 10, all 11 applicants updated their S-1 form multiple times to lower their ETF fees. Now, a similar trend is being observed among European listed exchange-traded products (ETPs).

Two leading asset managers, Invesco and WisdomTree, slashed fees on their European-listed ETPs by more than 60%. The $137 million Invesco Physical Bitcoin ETP will see a charge reduction from 0.99 percent to 0.39 percent, while the $325 million WisdomTree Physical Bitcoin ETP will see a cost reduction from 0.95 percent to 0.35 percent.

Read more

title: Mt. Gox confirms creditors’ Bitcoin addresses for repayment: Report
description:
After launching bank repayments in December 2023, the Mt. Gox trustee is getting ready to start repayments of BTC and BCH on Bitstamp and Kraken accounts.

Update Jan. 23, 10:50 am UTC: Added information about Bitstamp Canada users.

The trustee of the hacked cryptocurrency exchange, Mt. Gox, is inching toward Bitcoin (BTC) repayments as it reportedly reached out to creditors to confirm their identity and the existence of their accounts. 

Numerous Mt. Gox creditors reported receiving new emails from Mt. Gox about the completion of identity verification for crypto exchange accounts that are set to be used to repay Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash (BCH).

Read more

title: Crypto.com Report: Global Crypto Users Reach 580M by 2023
description:
A new market sizing report by cryptocurrency exchange Crypto.com reveals that the number of cryptocurrency owners globally surged by 34% in 2023, moving from 432 million at the start of the year to 580 million in December. Crypto.com uses a unique approach for its on-chain market sizing estimates. This methodology combines on-chain data with a […]

title: SOL, XRP, ADA, MATIC Tumble as Bitcoin Chills Investors’ Spines!
description:
According to information acquired from CoinMarketCap, Bitcoin’s (BTC) drop below $40,000 has influenced the prices of Solana (SOL), Ripple (XRP), Cardano (ADA), and Polygon (MATIC). At press time, SOL changed hands at $84.98—a 5.48% decline in the last 24 hours. XRP dropped to $0.52. ADA’s price decreased to $0.48, while MATIC’s fell to $0.75.  These […]
